SEARCH
Module fi.tuni.swdesign.movienightplanner
Package fi.tuni.swdesign.movienightplanner.controllers

Class SearchViewController

java.lang.Object
fi.tuni.swdesign.movienightplanner.controllers.SearchViewController
public class SearchViewController extends Object
Controller class for handling the search view of the application. It manages movie lists, filter options, and transitions between views such as profile and movie details.
Author:
Make, ChatGPT(setComboBoxLogic, Javadoc comments)

  • Constructor Details

    • SearchViewController

      public SearchViewController()

  • Method Details

    • setSceneController

      public void setSceneController(SceneController sceneController)
      Sets the SceneController instance for this controller. This method is used to inject the SceneController into the current context, allowing this controller to manage and switch scenes as needed.
      Parameters:
      sceneController - the SceneController to be associated with this controller.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the search view components, sets backgrounds, populates movie lists, and configures filter options. This method is called automatically after the FXML components have been loaded.

    • handleProfileButtonClick

      public void handleProfileButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Handles the action of switching to the profile view when the profile button is clicked.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by clicking the profile button.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while switching the scene.

    • handleFilterButtonClick

      private void handleFilterButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Handles the action of applying filters when the filter button is clicked. This filters the movies based on selected genres, audio, subtitles, and streaming providers.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by clicking the filter button.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs during filtering.

    • getCheckedValues

      private List<Integer> getCheckedValues(List<javafx.scene.control.CheckBox> checkBoxes)
      Returns a list of streaming provider IDs that have been selected by the user.
      Parameters:
      checkBoxes - List of checkboxes representing streaming providers.
      Returns:
      A list of integers representing the IDs of selected providers.

    • setFilterOptions

      private void setFilterOptions()
      Sets filter options for genres, audio, and subtitles. It populates combo boxes and applies logic for handling selections in the filtering options.

    • setComboBoxLogic

      private void setComboBoxLogic(org.controlsfx.control.CheckComboBox ccb)
      Applies logic to a CheckComboBox such that when one item is unchecked, all others are unchecked, and if none are checked, all items are selected.
      Parameters:
      ccb - The CheckComboBox to apply the logic to.

    • setMovieListView

      private void setMovieListView(List<Movie> movies, javafx.scene.control.ListView<Movie> lView)
      Populates a ListView with movie data. Each movie is displayed using custom labels that are loaded from an FXML file. These labels are cached for better performance.
      Parameters:
      movies - the list of movies to display in the ListView
      lView - the ListView component that will display the movie labels

    • setMovieGridView

      private void setMovieGridView(List<Movie> movies, org.controlsfx.control.GridView<Movie> lView)
      Populates a GridView with movie data. Each movie is displayed using custom labels that are loaded from an FXML file. These labels are cached for better performance.
      Parameters:
      movies - the list of movies to display in the GridView
      lView - the GridView component that will display the movie labels

    • handleMovieClick

      private void handleMovieClick(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event, Movie movie)
      Handles the event when a movie label is clicked. Switches the scene to the movie detail view.
      Parameters:
      event - The mouse event triggered by clicking a movie label.
      movie - The movie object whose details should be shown.

    • setStreamingProviders

      private void setStreamingProviders()
      Sets the streaming providers by iterating over the streaming provider nodes and assigning unique IDs from the provider list. After assigning the IDs, the method invokes setStreamingProviderLogos() to apply the provider logos.

    • setStreamingProviderLogos

      private void setStreamingProviderLogos()
      Sets the streaming provider logos in the search view by fetching and displaying them in the UI. If providers are not loaded, it will display an error logo.

    • populateMovieListAsync

      private void populateMovieListAsync(javafx.scene.control.Label loadingLabel, javafx.scene.Node lView, String url)
      Populates a ListView with a list of movies asynchronously by fetching movie data from the API.
      Parameters:
      loadingLabel - The label to display while loading movies.
      lView - The ListView or GridView to populate with movie data.
      url - The URL to fetch movie data from.

    • populateGenreComboBox

      private void populateGenreComboBox()
      Populates the genre combo box asynchronously by fetching genre data from the API.
